name: CompW Wavelet-Compressed Image
summary: Learn about .WLM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CompW is a suite of applications that allows users to compress images using wavelet compression, view those images online, and embed them in documents. Paralelo Computação is defunct, so CompW is discontinued and WLM files are uncommon.

description: A WLM file is a raster image created by Paralelo Computação CompW, an image compression program. It contains an image that has been compressed using wavelet compression. WLM files can be embedded in OLE-compliant documents, but can be viewed in those documents only if you have CompW installed.

instructions: You can open a WLM file with XnViewMP (multiplatform). To do so, select File → Open..., then navigate to and open your WLM file.

You can use Logipole Konvertor (Windows) or XnViewMP (multiplatform) to convert WLM files to other image formats. For example, XnViewMP can convert WLM files to the following formats (and many others):
